items.title: Israel approves extension of Gaza ceasefire
items.description: Israel proposes a six-week truce covering Muslim Ramadan and Jewish Passover - but Hamas has not yet commented.

items.title: In the US, DEI is under attack. But under a different name, it might live on
items.description: Donald Trump has promised to "terminate" diversity programmes. But a rebrand might yet save them.

items.title: 'They don't belong in the Med': Future of homeless orcas still uncertain
items.description: Animal rights campaigners and marine zoo official say Mediterranean is 'too warm' for killer whales.

items.title: Kurdish group PKK declares ceasefire with Turkey
items.description: The PKK calls for the release of its jailed leader Abdullah Ocalan to lead a process of disarmament.

items.title: How to watch the Oscars and who is nominated
items.description: Who will win, what can we expect and what has caused the most controversy this awards season?
